item.title: CSV to HTML – WordPress plugin
item.description:
CSV to HTML – WordPress plugin

Easily display, edit, and synchronize CSV files as dynamic HTML tables using a simple shortcode—no coding required.
item.content:encoded:
CSV to HTML – WordPress plugin

Easily display, edit, and synchronize CSV files as dynamic HTML tables using a simple shortcode—no coding required.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy A56 vs. Galaxy S24 FE
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy A56 vs. Galaxy S24 FE

The hugely popular Samsung Galaxy A series got its annual overhaul recently. The headlining A56 didn’t bring a whole lot of improvements over the previous generation, the most obvious being a chipset upgrade. Other than the A55 and the A36, the A56 needs to face another in-house competitor - the S24 FE could turn out to be the better option for someone that’s looking to spend A56 money.
If you’re like me, who’s contemplating at upgrading to the more modern mid-range Android Smartphone (me, I’m coming from the Samsung Galaxy S20 FE Snapdragon edition), then these are some of your choices.
item.content:encoded:
Samsung Galaxy A56 vs. Galaxy S24 FE

The hugely popular Samsung Galaxy A series got its annual overhaul recently. The headlining A56 didn’t bring a whole lot of improvements over the previous generation, the most obvious being a chipset upgrade. Other than the A55 and the A36, the A56 needs to face another in-house competitor - the S24 FE could turn out to be the better option for someone that’s looking to spend A56 money.
If you’re like me, who’s contemplating at upgrading to the more modern mid-range Android Smartphone (me, I’m coming from the Samsung Galaxy S20 FE Snapdragon edition), then these are some of your choices.

item.title: Arcane: Simple and Elegant Docker Management UI
item.description:
Arcane: Simple and Elegant Docker Management UI

Arcane is a modern, web-based interface for managing your Docker environment, built with SvelteKit. It offers a clean, intuitive overview and powerful management tools for your containers, images, volumes, and networks—all in one place.
I stopped using Portainer because I can manage my Docker containers from the command line anyway. But if there’s a sleeker alternative, why not?
item.content:encoded:
Arcane: Simple and Elegant Docker Management UI

Arcane is a modern, web-based interface for managing your Docker environment, built with SvelteKit. It offers a clean, intuitive overview and powerful management tools for your containers, images, volumes, and networks—all in one place.
I stopped using Portainer because I can manage my Docker containers from the command line anyway. But if there’s a sleeker alternative, why not?

item.title: BlogSimplicity WordPress Theme
item.description:
BlogSimplicity WordPress Theme

BlogSimplicity is a clean, minimalist theme designed specifically for bloggers who want a straightforward, easy-to-use platform for their writing. Featuring a responsive layout, it ensures your content looks great on any device. The theme supports custom menus, featured images, and includes a customizable sidebar to showcase your favorite widgets. BlogSimplicity is translation-ready, making it accessible to a global audience. Ideal for those who want a simple yet elegant blog without the fuss.
item.content:encoded:
BlogSimplicity WordPress Theme

BlogSimplicity is a clean, minimalist theme designed specifically for bloggers who want a straightforward, easy-to-use platform for their writing. Featuring a responsive layout, it ensures your content looks great on any device. The theme supports custom menus, featured images, and includes a customizable sidebar to showcase your favorite widgets. BlogSimplicity is translation-ready, making it accessible to a global audience. Ideal for those who want a simple yet elegant blog without the fuss.

item.title: Math Note WordPress Theme
item.description:
Math Note WordPress Theme

A WordPress theme designed for math notes. It has a minimalist look, ensuring your content takes center stage and remains the focal point. The theme comes with built-in MathJax support by default, rendering text enclosed in $…$ as inline math and $$…$$ as display math.
item.content:encoded:
Math Note WordPress Theme

A WordPress theme designed for math notes. It has a minimalist look, ensuring your content takes center stage and remains the focal point. The theme comes with built-in MathJax support by default, rendering text enclosed in $…$ as inline math and $$…$$ as display math.

item.title: Kometa-Team/Quickstart
item.description:
Kometa-Team/Quickstart

YAML Generator for use with Kometa.

Note:

It’s ideal that you go through the Kometa install walkthrough prior to running Quickstart, as that will get Kometa set up to accept the config file that Quickstart will produce. Running Quickstart and then the walkthrough could end up running into problems that will not be addressed in the walkthroughs; at best nothing in the walkthrough will match expectations so you will be left to figure out any differences yourself.
item.content:encoded:
Kometa-Team/Quickstart

YAML Generator for use with Kometa.

Note:

It’s ideal that you go through the Kometa install walkthrough prior to running Quickstart, as that will get Kometa set up to accept the config file that Quickstart will produce. Running Quickstart and then the walkthrough could end up running into problems that will not be addressed in the walkthroughs; at best nothing in the walkthrough will match expectations so you will be left to figure out any differences yourself.

item.title: Import CSV

The open-source CSV import solution for modern web applications. Import rows in seconds with intelligent column mapping and validation.
